text:
Hi there! Does this relate to the first suggestion you made? Re: default alt tag:

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Add-ALT-Text-field-at-the-file-manager-level/idi-p/198803>
You'd think I would remember submitting this lol. :faceplam:
Thank you everyone. I will resubmit AJ's post to ideas.
No need to resubmit. Just upvote the current idea :)

Hey Isaiah, real quick, our SEO Recommendations tool also will let you know when there are images on your site without ALT text. Not sure if you are familiar with the tool but you can find it here: <https://app.HubSpot.com/l/content-strategy/recommendations>
Let me know if you have any questions or if you have any feedback on the tool :slightly_smiling_face:
